title: TIFF dependent tests are run without libtiff available
body:
Running the test case `TestFileTiff.test_page_number_x_0` will fail if tiff support is not available. This test should be skipped in the same way that e.g. netpbm is skipped. 

```
======================================================================
ERROR: TestFileTiff.test_page_number_x_0
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/Pillow-3.0.0/Tests/test_file_tiff.py", line 328, in test_page_number_x_0
    im.save(outfile)
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/Pillow-3.0.0/PIL/Image.py", line 1633, in save
    self.load()
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/Pillow-3.0.0/PIL/TiffImagePlugin.py", line 890, in _load_libtiff
    self.decoderconfig)
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/Pillow-3.0.0/PIL/Image.py", line 415, in _getdecoder
    raise IOError("decoder %s not available" % decoder_name)
IOError: decoder libtiff not available
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 669 tests in 13.285s
FAILED (errors=1, skipped=136)
--------------------------------------------------------------------
PIL SETUP SUMMARY
--------------------------------------------------------------------
version      Pillow 3.0.0
platform     linux2 2.7.11 (default, Feb 16 2016, 12:46:10)
             [GCC 5.3.0]
--------------------------------------------------------------------
*** TKINTER support not available
--- JPEG support available
*** OPENJPEG (JPEG2000) support not available
--- ZLIB (PNG/ZIP) support available
*** LIBTIFF support not available
--- FREETYPE2 support available
*** LITTLECMS2 support not available
*** WEBP support not available
*** WEBPMUX support not available
--------------------------------------------------------------------
```
